1662620.name: RPG Maker MZ -  Tyler Warren RPG Battlers - 3rd 50
1662620.description:
Slimes and Dragons! Continuing in the style and charm of his previous battlers, this third pack of 50 monsters by artist Tyler Warren takes you to the next level. Get ready for a fresh new visual dimension for your professional or amateur project. Similar to Dragon Quest (Dragon Warrior) series monsters, this bundle features a healthy array of “Slime Monsters” and a gorgeous variety of powerful Dragons; a must have for any fantasy adventure game.

Features:

  • 50 unique and beautiful battlers
  • Files formatted for easy Plug and Play into RPG Maker MZ
  • All 50 battlers are presented in a range of sizes from large to mini; let the slime be the boss with no scaling issues!
  • Battlers also come in recommended sizes (proportional to each other) for RPG Maker MZ
  • Style used matches Tyler Warren’s other battler packs, similar in spirit to classic RPG characters of Dragon Quest (Dragon Warrior)
  • Recently remastered for sharper colors and better usability

    Terms of Use:

    * This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
    * OK to be used in Commercial projects
    * Contents can be edited
    * OK for use in games with gore
    * OK for use in adult-rated games
1662620.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
